Actions.Name: Razor Hook
Actions.Effects: If made from inside a pit, the [name] can fly 3 before the attack, and this attack deals bonus damage and blinds its target

Actions.Name: Grapnel Pick
Actions.Description: A foe in range takes 3 damage. If the [name] is standing in a pit, that foe also must save or swap places with the [name], teleporting.

Actions.Name: Gut Shot
Actions.Description: A foe in range is dazed and marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, the character gains an open wound. While wounded, it takes [D] again at the end of its turns. This marks ends if that character ends their turn adjacent to an ally.

Actions.Name: Subterranean Abduction
Actions.Effects: The [name] chooses a foe inside a pit anywhere, then removes both the [name] and them from the battlefield. The [name] and its victim both gamble, re-rolling ties. If the victim rolls higher, at the start of their turn they take 3 damage and may re-emerge from any pit of their choice at the start of their turn. If they lose the roll-off, they take 3 damage three times instead, and the [name] chooses which pit they emerge from at the start of their turn. The [name] returns to any open pit of its choice at the start of its turn.
